titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Barry C. Smith papers FA794

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 19:52:28 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research, with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Barry C. Smith papers include Commonwealth Fund Annual Reports (1919-1941), personal and professional correspondence and a variety of personal items.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Barry C. Smith papers were donated to RAC in 2015 and accessioned as 2015:107.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC has legal title, copyright and literary rights to the collection in so far as it holds them. RAC has authority to grant permission to publish.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Smith served as General Director of the Commonwealth Fund from 1920 to 1947.
